text: Mohammed Yousef el-Magariaf (also written as Magariaf, Elmegaryaf or Almegaryaf)"Profile: Libyan leader Mohamed Magariaf", by Rana Jawad, BBC News, 12 October 2012. or, as he writes on his official website, Dr. Mohamed Yusuf Al MagariafOfficial website of Dr. Al Magariaf . (in English & Arabic) (; born 1940), is a Libyan politician. He was the President of the General National Congress from its first meeting in August 2012 until his resignation in May 2013. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Heads of state of Libya Category:Ambassadors of Libya Category:Economists Category:African diplomats
title: Mohammed Magariaf
